## About myself

I am a mexican scientist starting my PhD at the <a href="https://www.eva.mpg.de/index/">[**Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology**]{style="color:  #2C698D;"}</a>, which combines my passions: Evolution and Bioinformatics.

As part of the <a href="https://www.eva.mpg.de/tropical-archaeogenomics/overview/">[**Tropical Archaeogenomics Group**]{style="color:  #2C698D;"}</a>, my research focuses on population genomics across time in the Americas and other tropical regions.

Besides my academic interests, I like training at the GYM, making videos of the new places I visit, and finding good places to eat.
